all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, fear not, little flock; do good; let earth and hell combine against you, for if ye are built upon my rock, they cannot prevail.
Doctrine and Covenants 6:34
Quote of the Day
"Whichever parts of us seem different, [God’s] love is where we find togetherness."
Karl D. Hirst | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
